quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将词根“vivi-”（活的）与“vivid”（生动的）混淆，结合“section”（部分）误判为“生动的片段”，或直接拆分词根为“活的部分”而非“活体解剖”。
quiz_item.sentence: The ethical debate over **vivisection** in medical research has been ongoing for decades, with animal rights activists strongly opposing the practice of operating on live animals for scientific purposes.
